Package Restaurant

Class Order

java.lang.Object
Restaurant.Order
public class Order extends Object
An instance of this object represents one order

      Constructor takes in staff ID, the table number, and the menu to create an Order

      staffID - Staff ID of staff in charge of taking order
      tableNum - Table number that this order is assigned to
      menu - Menu for reference for this Order
